    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako živijo po svetu</string>
            <string language="en">Homes around the world</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Häuser um die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maisons autour du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">HOME em torno do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sedi intorno al mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Οικίαες σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hogares alrededor del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prosojnica je pripomoček za učno uro na temo Kako živijo po svetu. Prosojnica ni samostojno gradivo za to temo, uporablja se poleg učbenika in delovnega zvezka.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of different homes around the world (houses, architectures, other ways of living, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mesto</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dom</string>
            <string language="en">home</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hiša</string>
            <string language="en">house</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">arhitektura</string>
            <string language="en">architecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der unterschiedlichen Häuser um die 
Welt (Häuser, Architektur, andere Methoden des Lebens...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de différentes maisons autour du 
monde (maisons, architectures, d'autres voies de la vie...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de HOME diferentes em torno do 
mundo (casas, arquiteturas, outras maneiras de viver...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione delle sedi differenti intorno al 
mondo (case, architetture, altri modi di vivere...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των διαφορετικών σπιτιών σε όλο τον κόσμο 
(σπίτια, αρχιτεκτονικές, άλλοι τρόποι...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de diversos hogares alrededor del 
mundo (casas, configuraciones, otras maneras de vivir...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stadt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
